args: I'm afraid of myself. Of what I am.\nEver since the old lady in the village\nwas killed, I haven't left my room.
Ulthar. The stray. The old woman.\nI killed them. I killed all of them.\nOh, savior! Help me!
Well, this must be Kyril. Hmm...\nSomething feels very off about this place.
Curran. I was sent here by the Church.
Don't look like a priest to me.
I'm not. Er, not exactly, at any rate.\nBut never mind that. What happened?
An old woman was murdered here\ntwo days prior.
Do you know who did this horrid deed?
It was HER! That gloomy girl!\nI'm certain of it, I am!

We all looked after her, and she repaid
our kindness with bloodshed and horror!
We never should have taken in someone
from a heretic village like Hethiwood!
Hold on. Hethiwood?\nIs that girl's name—
N-no! Don't come in! Leave me alone!
Sorry, but leaving scared little birds alone\njust isn't how I do things.
Why, I came to see my beloved little lady,\nof course.
Okay, maybe I exaggerated a little bit.\nBut I AM seriously worried about you.
I hear there's some trouble going on.
I...I don't know anything about it.
I don't know anything...\nI DON'T KNOW ANYTHING!
Okay, hang on! Breathe, kid. Breeeathe.\nI'm on your side here—I don't think you\ndid anything wrong.
I don't care! I'm scared! So just go!
All right. If that's what you want.\nBut if you ever need anything at all,\njust come find me, okay? I can help.
I'm sorry... I'm so sorry... I'm so sorry\nI'm so sorry I'm so sorry I'm so sorry...
*sigh* I heard rumors this village was\nharboring heretics, but I can't find a\nsingle one so far.
All anyone wants to talk about is Lathna.\n...Which I suppose makes sense,\ngiven the circumstances.
I should've brought that idiot after all,\neven if it meant dragging him here.
There's someone on the ground!\nHey, are you okay?! Are you...
Look what you've done now!\nMurderer! MURDERER!
I'm so sorry I'm so sorry I'm so sorry...
I don't want your APOLOGIES! I want my\nhusband back! BRING HIM BACK!
Easy now! No need for violence!\nWhat did Lathna do to you?
Do you even need to ask?\nShe killed my husband!
Give him back, you evil demon!\nGIVE HIM BAAAAAACK!

Listen, I know that you're upset, and I'm
terribly sorry for your loss. But I saw the
body myself, and there's no way that a
small child could have possibly—
I saw that girl with the victim last night.\nThe two of them met by a nearby lake.
She's been hiding indoors for days and\nNOW she comes out? She MUST have\nbeen the one to kill him!
That girl is the culprit, without a doubt.\nShe needs to face justice.
Dealing with heretics is my job, thank you.\nBelieve it or not, I'm an inquisitor.
Then serve your station and bring her to\njustice before she harms anyone else!
I promise you that justice will be done—\nand her name cleared.\n...Come on, Lathna.
Somewhere we can talk in private.
Hey, I said you could trust me, remember?\nSo wipe that scared look off your face—\nit doesn't fit a cute girl like you.
Come on! Pick up your spirits and\nmake that frown an upside clown!
